892960.name: Dimension Of Gameth
892960.description:
Digmension of Gameth(DOG) is the dimension that who ever came here you have to play DOG game. DOG is a 1 Player vs 1 Player Turn-Based RPG board-Game where you can bring varius of hero into your squad to fighting together against opponent.

There are some conditions to win the game
1. beating enemy chief hero
2. force enemy timeout

DOG allows you to pick 1 heroes as chief unit that you expect to have the best set of abilities that match your game plan to win the opponent
Playing turn-based with only 1 hero have no fun. DOG allows you to summon more heroes into your squad that cost by gem and the way to find gem is very easy killing heroes, destroying tower or even killing monster will give you a lot of gem.
and meanwhile you have to make your units get stronger by upgrading abilities also cost by gem the way to build them its depend on your game plan and situation. find your own way to win the game !!!

24 heroes with 3 skills available for now
collecting heroes
managing squad
destroying enemy
hope you enjoy !!!
